title: GoPro just shrunk its action cam in half, but it still packs a punch (Update)
text:
GoPro just shrunk its action cam in half, but it still packs a punch (Update) 
Published By: DigitalTrends.com - Today 
GoPro has a new action camera, and it's the company smallest and lightest. The Hero4 Session has many of the features of the Hero4 Black and...
